text.section:
Subject to the hearing provisions of § 16.5-209 of this subtitle, the Comptroller shall deny a license to any applicant who has had a license revoked under this section until:
1 year has passed since the license was revoked; and
it satisfactorily appears to the Comptroller that the applicant will comply with this title and any regulations adopted under this title.

Prior to the issuance or renewal of any license, the Comptroller shall conduct an investigation with regard to:
the applicant;
the business to be operated; and
the facts set forth in the application.
